RateAdjustmentByAttribute.name: RateAdjustmentByAttribute
RateAdjustmentByAttribute.description: Represents the adjustments that determine the rate of a resource based on its rate-impacting attributes. These attributes are linked to the usage product record. Rates are then influenced by conditions specified in the Attribute Based Adjustment Condition object. Finally, the charge rate is determined by using the Attribute Based Adjustment Rule object.

AdjustmentValue.description: Value of the rate adjustment based on the selected adjustment type.

AttributeBasedAdjRuleId.description: ID of the attribute based adjustment rule associated with this rate adjustment by attribute record.

EffectiveFrom.description: Date and time when the associated rate card entry comes into effect.

EffectiveTo.description: Date and time until when the associated rate card entry remains effective.

LastReferencedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last referred to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

Name.description: Auto-generated identifier for the rate adjustment by attribute record.

ProductId.description: ID of the product whose resource is being used as the associated rate card entry.

ProductSellingModelId.description: ID of the product selling model for the associated rate card entry.

RateCardEntryId.description: ID of the rate card entry associated with this rate adjustment by attribute record.

RateCardEntryStatus.description: Status of the rate card entry associated with this rate adjustment by attribute.

RateCardId.description: ID of the rate card of the associated rate card entry.

RateUnitOfMeasureId.description: ID of the standard unit of measure record of the associated rate card entry.

RateUnitOfMeasureName.description: Name of the standard unit of measure record of the associated rate card entry.

UsageResourceId.description: ID of the resource selected for the associated rate card entry.
